data.title: Go Large At London’s Kevin & Perry-Themed Bottomless Brunch Party
data.meta_description: Celebrate the beginning of summer with a smashing Kevin & Perry Bottomless Brunch Party at a secret London location turned Ibiza club!
data.text:
Celebrate the weekend with the two biggest losers in cinematic history.

The discovery that it has been a whole 20 years since Kevin & Perry went large in Ibiza might come as quite a shock. Kevin & Perry’s wild adventures on the White Isle are undeniably pretty legendary and, to celebrate the film’s anniversary, the geniuses behind UKG brunch have decided to throw a few Kevin & Perry-themed bottomless brunch parties this summer.

Taking over a yet-to-be-revealed location, this Kevin & Perry-themed brunch is a far cry from the avocado on toast and flat white you’re used to on a Saturday morning. With the venue set to be transformed into an incredible Ibiza super club, which could effortlessly rival the likes of Amnesia and Pacha, it’s time to dig out your rave gear and get your dance shoes on, because things are going to get messy.

DJ Eyeball Small will be serving up an array of Ibiza house and trance classics for you to get stuck into. Meanwhile, a range of interactive Kevin & Perry-themed games will also be taking place, to get you feeling all nostalgic about everyone’s favourite sad-cases.

Understandably, after all this excitement, you’ll have worked up quite the appetite. And because they wouldn’t want anyone shouting “That’s so unfair!”, the team have arranged maybe the most mouthwatering brunch known to man.

Featuring piles of BIRD’s utterly infamous fried chicken and mountains of piping-hot chips, there will be plenty on offer to help you refuel for the rest of the day. And, as if that wasn’t enough, you’ll also get to enjoy an entire hour of free-flowing rum punch!

With a full five hours of massive beats and eats on offer, there really is nowhere better to be on a Saturday this summer than one of these Kevin & Perry Bottomless Brunch Parties. All you need to do is bin off your horrible parents, make sure you don’t offend someone’s mirror on the doorstep, and say hello to a bottomless brunch the boys would be proud of. Plus, you can currently take advantage of a sweet deal that gets you two tickets for the price of one — find them here!

All our events are recommended by editors. Tickets purchased through Fever may earn Secret London commission.
